constituent: immediate, earthworm, drop, shovel, fishhook, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: Ever chopped the head off an earthworm? Notice how it will grow back immediately! Beware the killer earthworms...
koohiiStory2: When someone in the barracks tells you to come immediately, you´ll lose your head for sure トン トツ にわか.に とん.と つまず.く とみ.に ぬかずく suddenly; immediately; in a hurry.
kunYomi: にわか.に、とん.と、つまず.く、とみ.に、ぬかずく
